mapper.update: UPDATE `T_CLUB_MISSION` SET `IS_DEL` = 1 WHERE `mission_id` = #{notificationId} AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 0 AND `IS_DEL` = 0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` mission, `t_club` club WHERE mission.`mission_id` = #{notificationId} AND mission.`club_id` = club.`club_id` AND mission.`TYPE` = 0 AND mission.`IS_DEL` = 0
SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_CLUB` club WHERE club_mission.`CLUB_ID` = club.`club_id` AND club_mission.`IS_DEl` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 0 AND club.`club_id` = #{clubId}

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_STUDENT_MISSION_RELATION` student_mission WHERE club_mission.`mission_id` = student_mission.`MISSION_ID` AND club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND student_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 0 AND club_mission.`club_id` = #{clubId} AND student_mission.`STUDENT_ID` = #{studentId}

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_SCHOOL` school, `T_CLUB` club WHERE club_mission.`CLUB_ID` = club.`club_id` AND club.`SCHOOL_ID` = school.`school_id` AND club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 0 AND school.`school_id` = #{schoolId}

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_STUDENT_MISSION_RELATION` student_mission WHERE club_mission.`mission_id` = student_mission.`MISSION_ID` AND club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND student_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 0 AND club_mission.`STATUS` = 0 AND student_mission.`STUDENT_ID` = #{studentId}

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_SCHOOL` school, `T_CLUB` club WHERE club_mission.`CLUB_ID` = club.`club_id` AND club.`SCHOOL_ID` = school.`school_id` AND club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 0 AND club_mission.`STATUS` = 0 AND school.`school_id` = #{schoolId}

SELECT club_mission.`mission_id`, club_mission.`club_id`, club_mission.`attribution`, club_mission.`type`, club_mission.`deadline`, club_mission.`create_date`, club_mission.`is_del`, club_mission.`sponsor_id`, club.`name`, club.`status`, club.`avatar_url`, club.`slogan`, club.`level`, club.`school_id` FROM `t_club` club, `t_club_mission` club_mission WHERE club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 0 AND club.`club_id` = club_mission.`club_id` AND club_mission.`sponsor_id` = #{sponsorId}

SELECT * FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_club_mission` club_mission WHERE club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 0 AND club_mission.`mission_id` = #{notifyId} AND club_mission.`mission_id` = relation.`mission_id` AND relation.`is_del` = 0
